amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to increase the minimum amount made available to territories of the United States under the Sexual Assault Services Program and the Transitional Housing Assistance Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Plaskett amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Ms. Plaskett.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Plaskett amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
